snippet: The recognition of same-sex marriages by the Internal Revenue Service makes state bans look even more discriminatory.
abstract: Editorial holds that Internal Revenue Service's new rules recognizing same-sex marriages, even in states where such unions are not legal, makes state bans look even more discriminatory.
lead_paragraph: The recognition of same-sex marriages by the Internal Revenue Service makes state bans look even more discriminatory.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
